name: Cosmoteer (Master Krepta)
description:
Do you want to build a spaceship?

You are a humble toy, designed to inspire the imagination and creativity of children. But you have always dreamed for a life in the stars. The ship has already been designed, but is currently in pieces. Collect them all, and your dream of achieving flight. will be guaranteed. 

Pieces to look out for. 

THE COCKPIT: This will give you a double jump ability

THE ENGINES: This will increase your movement speed

THE CANOPY: This will complete your ship, and begin the spawning of fuel.

FUEL: Collect Ten of these and you Win!

throw bricks to distract the cat

Movement: WASD
Pickup Brick: E
Throw: T

Tools used. 

Music 
http://abundant-music.com
